SEARCH

Class RPNCalc

java.lang.Object
RPNCalc
public class RPNCalc extends Object
The RPNCalc class represents a Reverse Polish Notation (RPN) Calculator. It evaluates mathematical expressions written in RPN, also known as postfix notation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String[]
    equation
    The equation to be evaluated, represented as an array of strings.
    private double
    result
    The result of the evaluation if it has been run

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      public double evaluate()
      Evaluates the RPN equation.
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a double.

    • evaluate

      private double evaluate(int index, String[] current_arguments)
      Recursively evaluates the RPN equation from a given index with the current arguments.
      Parameters:
      index - the current index in the equation array.
      current_arguments - the current arguments (operands) as an array of strings.
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a double.
      Throws:
      Error - if the expression is invalid or contains unsupported operations.

    • parseOperatorOrNumber

      private double parseOperatorOrNumber(int index, String[] current_arguments, String token) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Parses the current token as either an operator or a number and proceeds with the evaluation accordingly.
      Parameters:
      index - the current index in the equation array.
      current_arguments - the current arguments (operands) as an array of strings.
      token - the current token to be parsed.
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation up to the current index as a double.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the token is an unsupported operation.
      Error - if the token is neither a valid number nor a supported operation.

    • appendToArray

      private String[] appendToArray(String[] array, String value)
      Appends a value to the end of an array.
      Parameters:
      array - the original array.
      value - the value to append.
      Returns:
      a new array with the value appended.

    • setEquation

      public void setEquation(String input)
      Sets the equation for the RPN calculator.
      Parameters:
      input - the RPN equation as a string, with elements separated by spaces.

    • lastCalculation

      public double lastCalculation()
      Returns the result of the last calculation or evaluates the current equation if not already done.
      Returns:
      the result of the last calculation or the evaluation of the current equation.
      Throws:
      Error - if the equation is invalid or contains unsupported operations.
